name: pwap
description: Pezkuwi Web App Projects - Monorepo for web, mobile, and SDK UI applications

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:sdk-ui
scripts.build:web: cd web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:sdk-ui: cd pezkuwi-sdk-ui && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:sdk-ui && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.install:all: npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile && npm run install:sdk-ui
scripts.clean: npm run clean:web && npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:sdk-ui
scripts.clean:sdk-ui: cd pezkuwi-sdk-ui && yarn clean && rm -rf node_modules
